lyric:
[by:本尼托先生]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Mariah Carey/Jermaine Dupri/James Wright/Charles Fox/Norman Gimbel 
[00:01.000] 作词 : Mariah Carey/Jermaine Dupri/James Wright/Charles Fox/Norman Gimbel 
[00:12.020] We're all in this together
[00:16.150] You're my only hope
[00:22.139] And it's too divided, too deep to understand
[00:26.862] But if we don't do it, tell me, who will?
[00:31.881] Oh, we always say these words that don't mean too much
[00:38.588] I wonder, where is the love?
[00:43.260] It's curious
[00:45.807] The fear still holding us down
[00:50.561] One day, will we look up?
[00:55.229] Y'all know what this is
[00:56.300] You got a right to your own love, baby
[00:58.305] But when it comes to the world we live in
[01:00.808] Isn't it the time that we start rebuilding
[01:03.367] All of the things that makes me crumble
[01:06.670] (We all) Tend to forget that (Wе all) Cease to exist and (Wе all)
[01:12.436] Life for ourselves
[01:14.140] If nobody bothers to find a solution
[01:16.955] If he won't, and she won't, and they won't, then we won't
[01:22.468] We won't ever learn to save the day, whoa, oh
[01:27.214] If he won't, and she won't, and they won't, then we won't
[01:32.417] We won't ever learn to save the day, whoa, oh
[01:38.383] We're all in this together
[01:42.681] You're my only hope (Only hope)
[01:48.657] And it's too divided, too deep to understand
[01:52.655] But if we don't do it, tell me, who will? Yeah
[01:57.266] Always say these words taht dont mean too much
[02:03.035] I won't die, where is the love?
[02:07.211] It's the cure, yeah
[02:11.202] The fear still holding us back
[02:13.976] One day, will we look up?
[02:18.007] It's up to us
[02:20.105] If he won't, and she won't, and they won't, then we won't
[02:24.194] We won't ever learn to save the day, whoa, oh
[02:27.469] (To save the day, to save the day)
[02:29.361] If he won't, and she won't, and they won't, then we won't
[02:34.035] (Come on, come on)
[02:35.577] (Will we) We won't ever learn to save the day, whoa, oh
[02:39.536] (Ever learn, no)
[02:41.007] La-la-la, la, la, la
[02:44.124] Woah, la
[02:49.093] Woah, la (Ha, ha, ha, ha)
[03:00.756] Laaaa
[03:05.131] Laaaa
[03:06.631] If he won't, and she won't, and they won't, then we won't
[03:10.802] We won't ever learn to save the day, whoa, oh (To save the day)
[03:14.877] If he won't, and she won't, and they won't, then we won't
[03:18.433] (She won't)
[03:20.938] We won't ever learn to save the day, whoa, oh
[03:24.101] (We will have to learn to save the day)
[03:25.654] If he won't, and she won't, and they won't, then we won't
[03:31.062] We won't ever learn to save the day
[03:35.292] We gon' learn, we gon' learn
[03:41.699] Said we gon' learn, oh
tlyric:
[by:闲攀蓼穗]
[00:12.020]我们都身陷囹圄
[00:16.150]你是我明灭可见的希望
[00:22.139]然而世事纷乱，难测其中深意
[00:26.862]但如果我们袖手旁观，谁又能挺身而出？
[00:31.881]我们总是将空无意义的空话挂在嘴边
[00:38.588]我思索着，所谓真爱在何方？
[00:43.260]让人疑惑
[00:45.807]恐惧将我们淹没
[00:50.561]我们是否能突破桎梏？
[00:55.229]我想你心知肚明
[00:56.300]也许你有心之所向
[00:58.305]但我们同处的这片苍穹呢？
[01:00.808]难道这不是
[01:03.367]重构这片断壁残垣之时吗
[01:06.670]我们总试着遗忘，同时也意味着我们将不复存在
[01:12.436]我们总习惯于偏安一隅
[01:14.140]但如果所有人都置若罔闻
[01:16.955]他呢？她呢？他们将怎样？我们将怎样
[01:22.468]我们如何逃出生天
[01:27.214]如果所有人都置之不理
[01:32.417]我们如何守得云开见月明
[01:38.383]我们众志成城
[01:42.681]你就是那隐隐闪烁的微光
[01:48.657]也许世事纷乱，难测其中深意
[01:52.655]但如果我们袖手旁观，谁又能挺身而出？
[01:57.266]我们总是将空无意义的空话挂在嘴边
[02:03.035]我们说着：有情饮水自饱
[02:07.211]但现实并非如此
[02:11.202]恐惧将我们吞噬
[02:13.976]我们将如何突破桎梏
[02:18.007]是时候做出改变了
[02:20.105]他呢？她呢？他们将怎样？我们将怎样
[02:24.194]我们将永远无法突破重围
[02:27.469]浴火重生
[02:29.361]他呢？她呢？他们将怎样？我们将怎样
[02:34.035]行动起来吧！行动起来吧！
[02:35.577]我们将永远无法突破重围
[02:39.536]永远一无所获
[02:41.007]lalalala
[02:44.124]哦~lalala
[02:49.093]lalalal
[03:00.756]laaa
[03:05.131]laaaa
[03:06.631]他呢？她呢？他们将怎样？我们将怎样
[03:10.802]我们将永远无法突破重围
[03:14.877]他呢？她呢？他们将怎样？我们将怎样
[03:18.433]（她袖手旁观）
[03:20.938]我们将永远无法突破重围
[03:24.101]我们将永远无法突破重围
[03:25.654]他呢？她呢？他们将怎样？我们将怎样
[03:31.062]我们将永远无法度过难关
[03:35.292]我们众志成城
[03:41.699]终将克服万难
